title: Touring with the Beatles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/20
itunes:title: Touring with the Beatles - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/31/20
description:
George Noory and reporter Ivor Davis discuss his time joining the Beatles during their first tour of America in 1964, meeting celebrities like Dean Martin and the Beach Boys, and the enduring popularity of John, Paul, George and Ringo 50 years after the band broke up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
